overview: Five stories connected by the actresses all wearing black silk stockings. In the first, an art seller and a real estate agent work on the sale of a painting. Next, Alex has his stenographer take some dictation...and other things.  A couple enjoys some alone time, while a professor teaches a group of students.  Finally, a pair of models accept an assignment from a photographer.
tagline: Soft and Sensual... Next to the Sensitive Skin She Saves For You...
title: Black Silk Stockings
